I didn't know I would enjoy this game so much when I bought it. Very fun playing as both the survivor or the killer!

I thought maybe I will play this game on occasion but it has ended up quickly becoming one of my most played games. 
While the concept of the game is very simple in nature and there are not a whole ton of complex mechanics or hard to learn skills, the game is still really fun to play and still has a ton of depth in it even though on the surface it doesn't seem like it. Very fun alone or with friends.

Killer builds and Survivor builds are always fun to tweak and play with and there are lots of tiny ways to improve your gameplay and become even better over time. A good killer or survivor are miles ahead of bad ones even with very simple game design. Tons of perks / add ons / different playstyles always keeps it fresh and fun and online ranking system exist too for those who want to try and climb the ladder.

Love it! The horror movie references and movie killers are awesome too for movie fans.
Great game for trryhardes and sweaty nerds like me.
This game was a good one but the last updates  made it worse IMO. The last killer is too op with the hooks and the lounge attack that you can't really see.

- I highly recommend this game to be played with friends because it makes your experience ten times better.
          - The game is better when you are not competitive and just play it for fun, because you can get really stressed if you are competitive.
          - Advice: don't get mad at your stupid teammates who will let you die on your first hook.üí©
          - Advice2: try not to break your monitor when the killer is facecamping you. (THIS IS REALLY A CHALLENGE!!!)üí©
          - Honestly this game is fun when you are good at it because you can have so much fun looping the killer.
          - Advice for killers: don't get mad when all the gens are done and you didn't even hit someone.üí©
          - Advice for killer2: don't get mad when you are rank 20 and the survivors you are against are rank 1üí©
          - Pls buy this game is awsome.

Its a very fun game for coop survival horror, wich sometimes its hard to know how to play when you are new but also with 2 games you learn everything about the game. 
Playing as the killer or survivor its very balanced because the perks or skills had they own deffub factor, this make the game interesting also for the player focused in winning the game or the killer doing his job.

I love the game to be honest, I'm a survivor main but I play killer from time to time, sadly there are toxicity in this game, the game is enjoyable as a solo player, i play with friends but only rarely, been playing the game for about 3 years it is my first game on steam.

The downside it has a lot of hooks and hooks are 10 meters far from each other making wiggle almost useless. 

P.S

Game released almost 3 years ago, and still no fucking lobby.

It's pretty fun if you just enjoy adrenaline. Be wary with which friends you share this with though, as they might not enjoy this game as much. If you're looking at reviews to find out whether or not you will like this game, you're fucked. It's a 50/50 depending on who you are as a player. Play it for free in some way or watch a shitload of YouTube vids on it if you want to be more informed but playing is the only way to really find out.

Grab your tents, pitchforks and teabags as you play a top tier camping and teabagging simulator.

Initially once I had played this game for like 50 hours, I had lost interest in it due to bugs and some questionable mechanics. Recently got back into it after not playing for a year or so. Once you learn the mechanics and start playing around them the game becomes really fun. It does require some grinding tho, and getting at least a few meta perks will really help you along.

The main problems I have with the game are lack of dedicated servers (maybe fixed soon?), and the struggle mechanic while hooked. There are a lot of other small annoyances but the game is still super fun, and imo the best asymmetric 1vMany game out there.

Got me hooked. Love the game. Hate it at the same time. Worth the money when on a sale.
this game makes me so sadistic

If your looking for a multiplayer, cooperative survival horror game, this is a fairly "decent" option out there. With having a rather fair amount of hours, and being a player since the game's open beta, I can say that this game has brought me a plethora of good times and general fun. Between playing as a Killer, or playing as a Survivor with friends. On paper, the concept is great, four survivors, one killer, work together and escape. Trying to learn how to hunt down your survivors or adapt and learn how to escape other killers.

Though I feel like over the year I've played the game, the sadly, "toxic" community and developers have worked in unison to degrade this game down. The casual audience has left this game, and I feel like it no longer really has a place for them, other then the more competitive, playing to win mentality players. From various, back and forth complaints, the game's mechanics have been thrown back and forth to try and achieve some balance, but in the end of the day its just a scrambled mess. 

While survivors are their own community, killers have been buffed and worked over more times then one. Limiting various things, such as the amount of pallets, time it takes to vault, repair, search, any actions just in general being slowed in the killer's benefit. While searching for games and playing them, I feel like I only ever see a small, and I mean small handful of select killers. I'm essentially talking about "meta" killers. Which in all honesty, takes a lot of playability away from this game. I don't even want to go on about the game's progressively growing DLCs. Which upon every new DLC coming out, seems to give killers that are just hysterical broken.

I'm probably going on now, but there is just so much things that have progressively gotten worse in this game that I can ramble on about. I sometimes come back, for a few days and try my hardest to give this game another go, but it just feels like I'm thrown back down, by either the few meta, more powerful killers or the toxic survivor community. Don't let me stop you from trying the game, its a reasonable price, and if you have some friends, you'll get some enjoyment from it for a little while, but in the long run I can't recommend this game.

Not enjoyable at all.

Yeah, the players can be toxic. Yeah, people disconnect. Yeah, people get salty and tunnel. This game is a buggy, lagtastic mess and has been for years; but I love it to death. I will say that I would not play this game, as a survivor, without at least 1 friend, for any extended period of time. Come on, I'm not a masochist. Roughly half of my time playing has been as killer, and it's quite enjoyable, just don't look at that end game screen and expect "gg" too frequently. Is it perfect? Nah. Is it a fun game to play for a few hours every couple of weeks with a couple of buddies? Yep. I do, however, think they should do some GoTY bundle for people who haven't been playing for 3 years buying dlc as they came.
Its unbalanced to hell lmfao. played as both the killer and survivor and the game favors the killer hands down. games only worth getting if you're going to climb as the killer and not the survivor
